casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Edward GODWIN, III 167PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2016 M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Godwin, William Edward (III). Teresa L. Townsend, Assistant Attorney General, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 23rd day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
